mapper.select: select baseInfo.user_data_id, u.login_name_email,u.login_name,u.login_pwd,u.loginpwd_modify_time,u.regist_time,u.register_client,u.trade_pwd,u.tradepwd_modify_time,u.uuid,u.invitation_code,u.state as user_state, baseInfo.id,baseInfo.user_id,baseInfo.real_name,baseInfo.id_no,baseInfo.id_addr,baseInfo.company_name,baseInfo.company_addr,baseInfo.sex,baseInfo.live_addr,baseInfo.live_time, baseInfo.marry_state,baseInfo.phone,baseInfo.phone_server_pwd,baseInfo.national,baseInfo.education,baseInfo.working_years,baseInfo.salary,baseInfo.create_time, baseInfo.update_time,baseInfo.user_id,baseInfo.live_detail_addr,baseInfo.head_img,baseInfo.living_img,baseInfo.front_img,baseInfo.back_img,baseInfo.ocr_img,baseInfo.live_coordinate, baseInfo.register_coordinate,baseInfo.register_addr,baseInfo.state,baseInfo.black_reason,baseInfo.company_phone,baseInfo.working_img,baseInfo.age, baseInfo.pan_number, baseInfo.pin_code from cl_user u left join cl_user_base_info baseInfo on u.id = baseInfo.user_id where u.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select ubi.*,bc.card_no,bc.bank,bc.ifsc_code,uec.phone as emer_phone,cbm.real_amount from cl_user_base_info ubi left join cl_bank_card bc on ubi.user_id = bc.user_id left join cl_user_emer_contacts uec on ubi.user_id = uec.user_id left join cl_borrow_main cbm on ubi.user_id = cbm.user_id where cbm.state in ('20','26') and uec.type = '直系'
